channel.title: Topnews on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Topnews on TechnoStreet

item.title: Shraddha Murder Case: Aaftab Poonawala seeks bail, files petition in Delhi court
item.description: Shraddha Murder Case: Aaftab Poonawala seeks bail, files petition in Delhi court Aftab Poonawala, the suspect in the murder of Shraddha Walkar, filed a petition at Delhi's Saket Court asking for bail in the case.

item.title: Research explores how "me-time" affects social interaction
item.description: Research explores how “me-time” affects social interaction New York: According to the findings of a recent study by University at Buffalo researchers, while many emerging adults find social connections delightful on days with more alone time, those who prefer solitude as a release from stress or bad social situations may not.

item.title: Mumbai, Delhi's air 'very poor', AQI at 309; city temperature at 24.8°C
item.description: Mumbai, Delhi’s air ‘very poor’, AQI at 309; city temperature at 24.

item.title: SJVN bags MSEDCL's 200-MW solar project worth ₹ 1,200 crore
item.description: SJVN bags MSEDCL’s 200-MW solar project worth ₹ 1,200 crore New Delhi: State-owned SJVN Ltd on Saturday said that its arm SJVN Green Energy has bagged a 200 MW solar project worth Rs1,200 crore from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company Ltd.

item.title: Malabar Hill reservoir revamp deferred
item.description: Malabar Hill reservoir revamp deferred Mumbai: The reconstruction of the 135-year-old Malabar Hill reservoir–which supplies water to south Mumbai–will now start from January 2023.

item.title: Navi Mumbai: Alcoholic man gropes daughter; held
item.description: Navi Mumbai: Alcoholic man gropes daughter; held The Kalamboli police have arrested a 35-year-old man for allegedly molesting his 14-year-old daughter.

item.title: Jacqueline Fernandez arrives at Delhi court in money laundering case involving conman Sukesh Chandrashekhar
item.description: Jacqueline Fernandez arrives at Delhi court in money laundering case involving conman Sukesh Chandrashekhar On Thursday, November 24, actor Jacqueline Fernandez arrived at the Patiala House Court in Delhi in connection with the Rs 200 crore money laundering case involving conman Sukesh Chandrashekhar.

item.title: Thane: Adulteration detected in 27% cooking oil from 4 firms by FDA
item.description: Thane: Adulteration detected in 27% cooking oil from 4 firms by FDA At least 27 per cent of the 56 samples of cooking oil and other food items collected from four companies in Maharashtra's Thane district have been found adulterated or with false claims, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) officials said.

item.title: Shraddha murder case: City psychologists say Aaftab must've killed her in a fit of rage, and chopped the body to hide his crime
item.description: Shraddha murder case: City psychologists say Aaftab must’ve killed her in a fit of rage, and chopped the body to hide his crime Mumbai: Following the horrific Delhi murder case where a man, Aaftab Ameen Poonawalla, 28, was arrested for allegedly killing his 26-year-old live-in partner Shraddha Vikas Walkar, chopping her body into 35 pieces, and disposing of the body parts at different places in and around the national capital - psychologists pitch into the possible reasons around the cause of muder and the psychological state of the killer.

item.title: WATCH: PM Modi unveils 108-feet-tall bronze statue of Bengaluru founder 'Nadaprabhu' Kempegowda
item.description: WATCH: PM Modi unveils 108-feet-tall bronze statue of Bengaluru founder ‘Nadaprabhu’ Kempegowda On November 11, Prime Minister Narendra Modi unveiled a 108-feet-tall bronze statue of Bengaluru founder 'Nadaprabhu' Kempegowda.

item.title: West Bengal: A suspected member of Al Qaeda in the Indian subcontinent arrested in Kolkata
item.description: West Bengal: A suspected member of Al Qaeda in the Indian subcontinent arrested in Kolkata Kolkata: A suspected member of the terror outfit, Al Qaeda in the Indian subcontinent (AQIS) and Ansarullah Bangla Team, was arrested in West Bengal's South 24 Parganas district, a senior officer told news agency PTI.

item.title: Maharashtra: Seven pilgrims killed, several injured in road accident in Solapur district
item.description: Maharashtra: Seven pilgrims killed, several injured in road accident in Solapur district Seven pilgrims were killed when a speeding car rammed into their procession on Monday evening in Maharashtra's Solapur district, police said.

item.title: DU admission 2022: More than 8,100 students allotted seats in second round
item.description: DU admission 2022: More than 8,100 students allotted seats in second round New Delhi: Over 8,100 new student applicants have been allotted seats in second round of college and programme allocation of Delhi University (DU), a DU registrar has informed PTI.

item.title: Pune: Two teenagers drown in Khed taluka
item.description: Pune: Two teenagers drown in Khed taluka Pune: Two 15 year olds drowned to death in a river in Aadgaon village of Khed taluka, near Pune district on October 30.

item.title: Gujarat: PM Narendra Modi’s meet with Patidar leader sets tongues wagging
item.description: Gujarat: PM Narendra Modi’s meet with Patidar leader sets tongues wagging Ahmedabad: Amid speculation that Prime Minister Narendra Modi may visit influential Patidar organisations on Sardar Patel’s birth anniversary on October 31 in a renewed bid to win over the community, Naresh Patel, Chairman of the Shree Khodaldham Trust, met him at his residence in New Delhi on Saturday evening.
